recipes.title: Veggie Stew
recipes.method: Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas Place the carrot, leek and tofu in a large bowl. Add the stock and mix well Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well Place the mixture in a large bowl and cover with a lid Place the lid on the oven and cook for 40 minutes Serve with a slaw of your choice

recipes.title: Veggie Pizza
recipes.method: Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas Place the carrot, leek and tofu in a large bowl. Add the stock and mix well Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well Place the mixture in a large bowl and cover with a lid Place the lid on the oven and cook for 40 minutes Serve with a slaw of your choice
